definitionList.name: E-CID MEASUREMENT INITIATION REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by LMF to initiate E-CID measurements.

elementList.name: Measurement Periodicity
elementList.description: The codepoint 60min applies only for ng-eNB. The codepoint “extended” is not applicable. This IE is not applicable to NR Angle of Arrival.

elementList.name: Measurement Quantities Value
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Cell-ID, Angle of Arrival, Timing Advance Type 1, Timing Advance Type 2, RSRP, RSRQ,…, SS-RSRP, SS-RSRQ, CSI-RSRP, CSI-RSRQ, NR Angle of Arrival, NR Timing Advance)

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of measured quantities that can be configured and reported with one message. Value is 64.

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the Report Characteristics IE is set to the value "Periodic".
This IE shall be present if the Report Characteristics IE is set to the value "Periodic" and the Measurement Quantities Item IE is set to the value "NR Angle of Arrival".

definitionList.name: E-CID MEASUREMENT INITIATION RESPONSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by NG-RAN node to indicate that the requested E-CID measurement is successfully initiated.

definitionList.name: E-CID MEASUREMENT INITIATION FAILURE
descriptionList: This message is sent by NG-RAN node to indicate that the requested E-CID measurement cannot be initiated.

definitionList.name: E-CID MEASUREMENT FAILURE INDICATION
descriptionList: This message is sent by NG-RAN node to indicate that the previously requested E-CID measurement can no longer be reported.

definitionList.name: E-CID MEASUREMENT REPORT
descriptionList: This message is sent by NG-RAN node to report the results of the requested E-CID measurement.

definitionList.name: E-CID MEASUREMENT TERMINATION COMMAND
descriptionList: This message is sent by the LMF to terminate the requested E-CID measurement.

definitionList.name: OTDOA INFORMATION REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by LMF to request OTDOA information.

elementList.name: OTDOA Information Item
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (pci, cellid, tac, earfcn, prsBandwidth, prsConfigIndex, cpLength, noDlFrames, noAntennaPorts, sFNInitTime, nG-RANAccessPointPosition, prsmutingconfiguration, prsid, tpid, tpType, crsCPlength, dlBandwidth, multipleprsConfigurationsperCell, prsOccasionGroup, prsFrequencyHoppingConfiguration, …, tddConfig)

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of OTDOA information types that can be requested and reported with one message. Value is 63.

definitionList.name: OTDOA INFORMATION RESPONSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by NG-RAN node to provide OTDOA information.

elementList.name: OTDOA Cells
elementList.description: Served cells/TPs that broadcast PRS. May be used to signal multiple PRS configurations per cell/TPs (up to 3 are supported in this release).

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. cells that can be served by a RAN Node. Value is 16384.

definitionList.name: OTDOA INFORMATION FAILURE
descriptionList: This message is sent by NG-RAN node to indicate that the OTDOA information cannot be provided.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING INFORMATION REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by the LMF to request positioning information.

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the UE TEG Information Request IE is set to the value "periodic".

definitionList.name: POSITIONING INFORMATION RESPONSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the NG-RAN node to provide positioning information.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING INFORMATION FAILURE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the NG-RAN node to indicate that the positioning information cannot be provided.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING INFORMATION UPDATE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the NG-RAN node to indicate that a change in the SRS configuration or UE Tx TEG association has occurred.

definitionList.name: TRP INFORMATION REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by an LMF to request information for TRPs hosted by an NG-RAN node.

elementList.name: TRP Information Type Item
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (nr pci, ng-ran cgi, nr arfcn, prs config, ssb config, sfn init time, spatial direction info, geo-coordinates, …, trp type, on-demand prs, trp tx teg, beam antenna info)

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of TRPs in a NG-RAN node. Value is 65535
Maximum no of TRP information types that can be requested and reported with one message. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: TRP INFORMATION RESPONSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by an NG-RAN node to convey TRP information to an LMF.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of TRPs in a NG-RAN node. Value is 65535.

definitionList.name: TRP INFORMATION FAILURE
descriptionList: This message is sent by an NG-RAN node to indicate that the requested TRP information cannot be provided to an LMF.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING ACTIVATION REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by the LMF to cause the NG RAN node to activate/trigger UL SRS transmission by the UE.

elementList.name: SRS Spatial Relation
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Spatial Relation Information per SRS Resource IE is present.

elementList.name: Spatial Relation Information per SRS Resource
Activation Time
elementList.description: Indicates the start time when the SRS activation is requested

definitionList.name: POSITIONING ACTIVATION RESPONSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by NG-RAN node to confirm successful UL SRS activation in the UE.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING ACTIVATION FAILURE
descriptionList: This message is sent by NG-RAN node to indicate that activation of UL SRS transmission in the UE was unsuccessful.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING DEACTIVATION
descriptionList: This message is sent by the LMF to cause the NG RAN node to deactivate UL SRS transmission or release all the transmission by the UE.

elementList.name: Release ALL
elementList.description: the NG-RAN node configures UE to stop transmitting SRS for the positioning purpose

definitionList.name: PRS CONFIGURATION REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by the LMF to request the NG-RAN node to configure or update PRS transmission.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of TRPs in a NG-RAN node. Value is 65535

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the PRS Configuration Request Type IE is set to the value "configure".
This IE shall be present if the PRS Configuration Request Type IE is set to the value "off".

definitionList.name: PRS CONFIGURATION RESPONSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the NG-RAN node to acknowledge configuring or updating the PRS transmission.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of TRPs in a NG-RAN node. Value is 65535

definitionList.name: PRS CONFIGURATION FAILURE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the NG-RAN node to indicate that it cannot configure any PRS transmission.

definitionList.name: MEASUREMENT PRECONFIGURATION REQUIRED
descriptionList: This message is sent by the LMF to provide the PRS configuration information of multiple TRPs to the NG-RAN node and request to configure measurement gap or PRS processing window of the UE.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of TRPs for on-demand PRS in a NG-RAN node. Value is 256.

definitionList.name: MEASUREMENT PRECONFIGURATION CONFIRM
descriptionList: This message is sent by the NG-RAN node to the LMF to confirm successful configuration of measurement gap or PRS processing window of the UE.

elementList.name: Preconfiguration Result
elementList.description: Indicates what has been preconfigured in the UE. first bit: measurement gaps second bit: PRS processing windows. Other bits reserved for future use. Value '1' indicates 'has been preconfigured', Value '0' indicates 'not preconfigured'.

definitionList.name: MEASUREMENT PRECONFIGURATION REFUSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the NG-RAN node to indicate that configuration of measurement gap or PRS processing window of the UE was unsuccessful.

definitionList.name: MEASUREMENT ACTIVATION
descriptionList: This message is sent by the LMF to request the NG-RAN node to activate or deactivate the preconfigured measurement gap or PRS processing window for the UE.

elementList.name: MeasPRS Periodicity
elementList.description: Measurement gap periodicity in units of ms

elementList.name: MeasPRS Offset
elementList.description: Measurement gap offset in units of subframes

elementList.name: Measurement PRS Length
elementList.type: ENUMERATED {ms1dot5, ms3, ms3dot5, ms4, ms5dot5, ms6, ms10, ms20}

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of frequency layers. Value is 4

definitionList.name: ERROR INDICATION
descriptionList: This message is used to indicate that some error has been detected in the NG-RAN node or in the LMF.
definitionList.direction: Direction: LMF NG-RAN node and NG-RAN node LMF.

definitionList.name: ASSISTANCE INFORMATION CONTROL
descriptionList: This message is sent by the LMF to transfer assistance information.

elementList.name: Positioning Broadcast Cells
elementList.description: The cell(s) that are requested to broadcast posSIB(s) according to the Assistance Information IE.

definitionList.name: ASSISTANCE INFORMATION FEEDBACK
descriptionList: This message is sent by the NG-RAN Node to give feedback on assistance information broadcasting.

elementList.name: Positioning Broadcast Cells
elementList.description: The cells associated to the feedback provided in the Assistance Information Failure List IE.

definitionList.name: MEASUREMENT REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by the LMF to request the NG-RAN node to configure a positioning measurement.

elementList.name: Cell ID
elementList.description: The Cell ID of the TRP identified by the TRP ID IE.

elementList.name: Measurement Periodicity
elementList.description: The codepoint 120ms, 240ms, 480ms, 1024ms, 2048ms, 1min, 6min, 12min, 30min, and 60min are not applicable

elementList.name: TRP Measurement Type
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (gNB-RxTxTimeDiff, UL-SRS-RSRP, UL-AoA, UL-RTOA,…, Multiple UL-AoA, UL SRS-RSRPP)

elementList.name: Timing Reporting Granularity Factor
elementList.description: Value (0..5) corresponds to (k0..k5) TS 38.133 [16]

elementList.name: SFN initialisation Time
elementList.description: If this IE is not present, the TRP may assume that the value is same as its own SFN initialisation time.

elementList.name: Measurement Beam Information Request
elementList.description: This IE is ignored when the Measurement Characteristics Request Indicator IE is included.

elementList.name: Response Time
elementList.description: This IE is ignored when the Report Characteristics IE is set to “periodic”.

elementList.name: Measurement Amount
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Report Characteristics IE is set to ‘OnDemand’. Value 0 represents an infinite number of periodic reporting.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of measured quantities that can be configured and reported with one positioning measurement message. Value is 16384.
Maximum no. of TRPs that can be included within one message. Value is 64.

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the Report Characteristics IE is set to the value "Periodic".
This IE shall be present if the Measurement Periodicity IE is set to the value "extended".

definitionList.name: MEASUREMENT RESPONSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the NG-RAN node to report positioning measurements for the target UE.

elementList.name: Cell ID
elementList.description: The Cell ID of the TRP identified by the TRP ID IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of TRPs that can be included within one message. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: MEASUREMENT FAILURE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the NG-RAN node to report measurement failure.

definitionList.name: MEASUREMENT REPORT
descriptionList: This message is sent by the NG-RAN node to report positioning measurements for the target UE.

elementList.name: Cell ID
elementList.description: The Cell ID of the TRP identified by the TRP ID IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of TRPs that can be included within one message. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: MEASUREMENT UPDATE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the LMF to update a previously configured measurement.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of TRPs that can be included within one message. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: MEASUREMENT ABORT
descriptionList: This message is sent by the LMF to request the NG-RAN node to abort a measurement.

definitionList.name: MEASUREMENT FAILURE INDICATION
descriptionList: This message is sent by the NG-RAN node to indicate that the previously requested measurements can no longer be reported.

definitionList.name: Cause
descriptionList: The purpose of the cause information element is to indicate the reason for a particular event for the whole protocol.

elementList.name: Radio Network Layer Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Unspecified, Requested Item not Supported, Requested Item Temporarily not Available, ..., Serving NG-RAN node changed, Requested Item not Supported on Time )

elementList.name: Protocol Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Transfer Syntax Error, Abstract Syntax Error (Reject), Abstract Syntax Error (Ignore and Notify), Message not Compatible with Receiver State, Semantic Error, Unspecified, Abstract Syntax Error (Falsely Constructed Message), ...)

definitionList.name: Criticality Diagnostics
descriptionList: The Criticality Diagnostics IE is sent by the NG-RAN node or LMF when parts of a received message have not been comprehended or were missing, or if the message contained logical errors. When applicable, it contains information about which IEs were not comprehended or were missing. The conditions for inclusion of the NRPPa Transaction ID IE are described in clause 10.

elementList.name: Procedure Code
elementList.description: Procedure Code is to be used if Criticality Diagnostics is part of Error Indication procedure, and not within the response message of the same procedure that caused the error.

elementList.name: Triggering Message
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (initiating message, successful outcome, unsuccessful outcome)
elementList.description: The Triggering Message is used only if the Criticality Diagnostics is part of Error Indication procedure.

elementList.name: Procedure Criticality
elementList.description: This Procedure Criticality is used for reporting the Criticality of the Triggering message (Procedure).

elementList.name: IE Criticality
elementList.description: The IE Criticality is used for reporting the criticality of the triggering IE. The value "ignore'" shall not be used.

elementList.name: IE ID
elementList.description: The IE ID of the not understood or missing IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of IE errors allowed to be reported with a single message. The value for maxNroOfErrors is 256.

definitionList.name: Message Type
descriptionList: The Message Type IE uniquely identifies the message being sent. It is mandatory for all messages.

elementList.name: Type of Message
elementList.type: CHOICE (Initiating Message, Successful Outcome, Unsuccessful Outcome, …)

definitionList.name: NRPPa Transaction ID
descriptionList: The NRPPa Transaction ID IE is used to associate all the messages belonging to the same procedure. Messages belonging to the same procedure shall use the same NRPPa Transaction ID.
The NRPPa Transaction ID is determined by the initiating peer of a procedure.
The NRPPa Transaction ID shall uniquely identify a procedure among all ongoing parallel procedures using the same procedure code, and initiated by the same protocol peer.

definitionList.name: E-CID Measurement Result
descriptionList: The purpose of the E-CID Measurement Result information element is to provide the E-CID measurement result.

elementList.name: Serving Cell ID
elementList.description: NG-RAN Cell Identifier of the serving cell

elementList.name: Serving Cell TAC
elementList.description: Tracking Area Code of the serving cell

elementList.name: NG-RAN Access Point Position
elementList.description: The configured estimated geographical position of the antenna of the cell. If the Geographical Coordinates IE is used, the NG-RAN Access Point Position IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: Measured Results
elementList.description: Measurement results of the serving RAT.

elementList.name: Value Angle of Arrival EUTRA
elementList.description: According to mapping in TS 36.133 [9]

elementList.name: Value Timing Advance Type 1 EUTRA
elementList.description: As defined in TS 36.214 [17]

elementList.name: Value Timing Advance Type 2 EUTRA
elementList.description: As defined in TS 36.214 [17]

elementList.name: PCI EUTRA
elementList.description: Physical Cell Identifier of the reported E-UTRA cell

elementList.name: EARFCN
elementList.description: Corresponds to NDL for FDD and NDL/UL for TDD in ref. TS 36.104 [7]

elementList.name: CGI EUTRA
elementList.description: Cell Global Identifier of the reported E-UTRA cell

elementList.name: PCI EUTRA
elementList.description: Physical Cell Identifier of the reported E-UTRA cell

elementList.name: EARFCN
elementList.description: Corresponds to NDL for FDD and NDL/UL for TDD in ref. TS 36.104 [7]

elementList.name: CGI EUTRA
elementList.description: Cell Global Identifier of the reported E-UTRA cell

elementList.name: Value SS-RSRP Cell
elementList.description: SS-RSRP measurement aggregated at cell level

elementList.name: Value SS-RSRP
elementList.description: SS-RSRP measurement per SSB resource

elementList.name: Value SS-RSRQ Cell
elementList.description: SS-RSRQ measurement aggregated at cell level

elementList.name: Value SS-RSRQ
elementList.description: SS-RSRQ measurement per SSB resource

elementList.name: Value CSI-RSRP Cell
elementList.description: CSI-RSRP measurement aggregated at cell level

elementList.name: Value CSI-RSRP
elementList.description: CSI-RSRP measurement per CSI-RS resource

elementList.name: Value CSI-RSRQ Cell
elementList.description: CSI-RSRQ measurement aggregated at cell level

elementList.name: Value CSI-RSRQ
elementList.description: CSI-RSRQ measurement per CSI-RS resource

elementList.name: Value Timing Advance NR
elementList.description: As defined in TS 38.215 [19]

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of measured quantities that can be configured and reported with one message. Value is 64.
Maximum no. of cells that can be reported with one message. Value is 9.
Maximum no. of NR cells that can be reported with one message. Value is 9.
Maximum no. of beam level measurement results that can be reported with one message. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: NG-RAN CGI
descriptionList: The NG-RAN Cell Global Identifier (CGI) is used to globally identify a cell.

definitionList.name: CGI EUTRA
descriptionList: The Cell Global Identifier EUTRA is used to globally identify an E-UTRA cell.

definitionList.name: PLMN Identity
descriptionList: This IE indicates the PLMN Identity.

elementList.name: PLMN Identity
elementList.description: Digits 0 to 9 encoded 0000 to 1001, 1111 used as filler digit. Two digits per octet: - bits 4 to 1 of octet n encoding digit 2n-1 - bits 8 to 5 of octet n encoding digit 2n PLMN Identity consists of 3 digits from MCC followed by either: - a filler digit plus 2 digits from MNC (in case of 2 digit MNC) or - 3 digits from MNC (in case of 3 digit MNC).

definitionList.name: NR CGI
descriptionList: The Cell Global Identifier NR is used to globally identify an NR cell.

definitionList.name: NG-RAN Access Point Position
descriptionList: The NG-RAN Access Point Position IE is used to identify the geographical position of an NG-RAN Access Point. It is expressed as ellipsoid point with altitude and uncertainty ellipsoid according to TS 23.032 [8].

elementList.name: Degrees Of Latitude
elementList.description: The IE value (N) is derived by this formula: N223 X /90  N+1 X being the latitude in degrees (0°.. 90°).

elementList.name: Degrees Of Longitude
elementList.description: The IE value (N) is derived by this formula: N224 X /360  N+1 X being the longitude in degrees (-180°..+180°).

elementList.name: Altitude
elementList.description: The relation between the value (N) and the altitude (a) in meters it describes is N a < N+1, except for N=215-1 for which the range is extended to include all greater values of (a).

elementList.name: Uncertainty semi-major
elementList.description: The uncertainty "r" is derived from the "uncertainty code" k by r = 10x(1.1k-1).

elementList.name: Uncertainty semi-minor
elementList.description: The uncertainty "r" is derived from the "uncertainty code" k by r = 10x(1.1k-1).

elementList.name: Uncertainty Altitude
elementList.description: The uncertainty altitude "h" expressed in metres is derived from the "uncertainty code" k, by: h=45x(1.025k-1).

elementList.name: Confidence
elementList.description: In percentage

definitionList.name: TAC
descriptionList: This information element is used to uniquely identify a Tracking Area Code.

definitionList.name: Cell Portion ID
descriptionList: This parameter gives the current Cell Portion associated with the target UE. The Cell Portion ID is the unique identifier for a cell portion within a cell.

definitionList.name: Other-RAT Measurement Result
descriptionList: The purpose of the Other-RAT Measurement Result information element is to provide the measurement results of RATs other than the serving RAT.

elementList.name: UTRA EcNo
elementList.description: This IE applies to FDD only.

elementList.name: SS-RSRP Cell
elementList.description: SS-RSRP measurement aggregated at cell level

elementList.name: SS-RSRQ Cell
elementList.description: SS-RSRQ measurement aggregated at cell level

elementList.name: Value SS-RSRP
elementList.description: SS-RSRP measurement per SSB resource

elementList.name: Value SS-RSRQ
elementList.description: SS-RSRQ measurement per SSB resource

elementList.name: CGI NR
elementList.description: Cell Global Identifier of the reported NR cell

elementList.name: CGI EUTRA
elementList.description: Cell Global Identifier of the reported E-UTRA cell

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of measured quantities that can be configured and reported with one message. Value is 64.
Maximum no. of GERAN cells that can be reported with one message. Value is 8.
Maximum no. of UTRAN cells that can be reported with one message. Value is 8.
Maximum no. of NR cells that can be reported with one message. Value is 8.
Maximum no. of EUTRA cells that can be reported with one message. Value is 8.
Maximum no. of beam level measurement results that can be reported with one message. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: WLAN Measurement Result
descriptionList: The WLAN Measurement Result information element provides the WLAN measurement results.

elementList.name: SSID
elementList.description: Includes the SSID field as defined in subclause 8.4.2.2 of IEEE 802.11™ [11].

elementList.name: BSSID
elementList.description: Includes the BSSID field as defined in subclause 8.2.4.3.4 of IEEE 802.11™ [11].

elementList.name: HESSID
elementList.description: Includes the HESSID field as defined in subclause 8.4.2.94 of IEEE 802.11™ [11].

elementList.name: Operating Class
elementList.description: Indicates the WLAN Operating Class as defined in IEEE 802.11™ [11].

elementList.name: Country Code
elementList.description: Indicates the WLAN country code as defined in IEEE 802.11™ [11].

elementList.name: WLAN Channel
elementList.description: Indicates the WLAN channel number as defined in IEEE 802.11™ [11].

elementList.name: WLAN Band
elementList.description: Indicates the WLAN band as defined in IEEE 802.11™ [11].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of measured quantities that can be configured and reported with one message. Value is 63.
Maximum no. of WLAN channels that can be reported within one list. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: OTDOA Cell Information
descriptionList: This IE contains OTDOA information of a cell/TP.

elementList.name: PCI EUTRA
elementList.description: Physical Cell ID of the reported E-UTRA cell.

elementList.name: CGI EUTRA
elementList.description: Cell Global Identifier of the E-UTRA cell.

elementList.name: TAC
elementList.description: Tracking Area Code

elementList.name: EARFCN
elementList.description: Corresponds to NDL for FDD and NDL/UL for TDD in ref. TS 36.104 [7].

elementList.name: PRS Bandwidth EUTRA
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (bw6, bw15, bw25, bw50, bw75, bw100, ...)
elementList.description: Transmission bandwidth of PRS

elementList.name: PRS Configuration Index EUTRA
elementList.description: PRS Configuration Index, ref TS 36.211 [10]

elementList.name: CP Length EUTRA
elementList.description: Cyclic prefix length of the PRS

elementList.name: Number of DL Frames EUTRA
elementList.description: Number of consecutive downlink subframes NPRS with PRS, ref TS 36.211 [10]

elementList.name: Number of Antenna Ports EUTRA
elementList.description: Number of used antenna ports, where n1-or-n2 corresponds to 1 or 2 ports, n4 corresponds to 4 ports

elementList.name: SFN Initialisation Time EUTRA
elementList.description: Time in seconds relative to 00:00:00 on 1 January 1900 (calculated as continuous time without leap seconds and traceable to a common time reference) where binary encoding of the integer part is in the first 32 bits and binary encoding of the fraction part in the last 32 bits. The fraction part is expressed with a granularity of 1 /2**32 second.

elementList.name: NG-RAN Access Point Position
elementList.description: The configured estimated geographical position of the antenna of the cell/TP.

elementList.name: PRS Muting Configuration EUTRA
elementList.description: The configuration of positioning reference signals muting pattern.

elementList.name: PRS-ID EUTRA
elementList.description: PRS ID, ref TS 36.211 [10].

elementList.name: TP-ID EUTRA
elementList.description: Identity of the transmission point. This IE together with the PCI and/or PRS-ID may be used to identify the transmission point in case the same physical cell ID is shared by multiple transmission points.

elementList.name: TP Type EUTRA
elementList.description: A TP which transmits PRS only.

elementList.name: Number of DL Frames-Extended EUTRA
elementList.description: Number of consecutive downlink subframes NPRS with PRS, ref TS 36.211 [10].

elementList.name: CRS CP Length EUTRA
elementList.description: Cyclic prefix length of the CRS.

elementList.name: DL Bandwidth EUTRA
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (bw6, bw15, bw25, bw50, bw75, bw100, ...)
elementList.description: DL transmission bandwidth expressed in units of resource blocks NRB, ref TS 36.104 [7].

elementList.name: PRS Occasion Group EUTRA
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (og2, og4, og8, og16, og32, og64, og128, ...)
elementList.description: PRS occasion group in a PRS period, ref TS 36.211 [10].

elementList.name: PRS Frequency Hopping Configuration EUTRA
elementList.description: PRS frequency hopping configuration.

elementList.name: TDD Configuration EUTRA
elementList.description: TDD specific physical channel configuration.

elementList.name: NR CGI
elementList.description: Cell Global Identifier of the NR cell.

elementList.name: SFN Initialisation Time NR
elementList.description: Time in seconds relative to 00:00:00 on 1 January 1900 (calculated as continuous time without leap seconds and traceable to a common time reference) where binary encoding of the integer part is in the first 32 bits and binary encoding of the fraction part in the last 32 bits. The fraction part is expressed with a granularity of 1 /2**32 second.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of OTDOA information types that can be requested and reported with one message. Value is 63.

definitionList.name: PRS Muting Configuration EUTRA
descriptionList: The PRS Muting Configuration EUTRA IE is used to describe the configuration of PRS muting patterns for the concerned cell/TP, according to TS 36.211 [10] and TS 36.133 [9].

elementList.name: Two
elementList.description: If a bit is set to "0", it indicates that the PRS is muted in the corresponding PRS positioning occasion (numbering from any sub frame for which SFN=0) in a periodic cycle of length equal to the length of the bit string

elementList.name: Four
elementList.description: Same as above

elementList.name: Eight
elementList.description: Same as above

elementList.name: Sixteen
elementList.description: Same as above

elementList.name: thirty-two
elementList.description: Same as above

elementList.name: sixty-four
elementList.description: Same as above

elementList.name: one-hundred-and-twenty-eight
elementList.description: Same as above

elementList.name: two-hundred-and-fifty-six
elementList.description: Same as above

elementList.name: five-hundred-and-twelve
elementList.description: Same as above

elementList.name: one-thousand-and-twenty-four
elementList.description: Same as above

definitionList.name: PRS Frequency Hopping Configuration EUTRA
descriptionList: The PRS Frequency Hopping Configuration EUTRA IE is used to describe the configuration of PRS frequency hopping for the concerned cell/TP, according to TS 36.211 [10].

elementList.name: Number of Frequency Hopping Bands
elementList.description: Number of bands for frequency hopping.

elementList.name: NarrowBand Index
elementList.description: Narrowband Index

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of frequency hopping bands minus one. Value is 7.

definitionList.name: TDD Configuration EUTRA
descriptionList: The TDD Configuration EUTRA IE is used to specify the TDD specific physical channel configuration.

elementList.name: Subframe Assignment
elementList.type: ENUMERATED ( sa0, sa1, sa2, sa3, sa4, sa5, sa6, … )
elementList.description: sa0 points to Configuration 0, sa1 to Configuration 1 etc. as specified in TS 36.211 [6, table 4.2-2].

definitionList.name: Assistance Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the assistance information.

elementList.name: System Information
elementList.description: Corresponds to the number of SI messages with posSIBs to be scheduled

elementList.name: Broadcast Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms80, ms160, ms320, ms640, ms1280, ms2560, ms5120, ...)
elementList.description: Broadcast Periodicity for the Pos SIBs, see TS 38.331 [13]

elementList.name: Pos SIBs
elementList.description: Number of posSIBs in the System Information.

elementList.name: Broadcast Priority
elementList.description: The priority of the assistance Information where 1 represents the highest priority and 16 the lowest priority

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum number of positioning system information messages. Value is 32.
Maximum number of positioning system information blocks included in the message. Value is 32.

definitionList.name: PosSIB Segments
descriptionList: This IE provides one posSIB or two or more posSIB segments which must be scheduled in series in consecutive transmissions of the same SI message.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum number of positioning SIB segments (in case of Assistance Information Element contains segmented data according to TS 37.355 [14]). Value is 64.

definitionList.name: Assistance Information Meta Data
descriptionList: This parameter contains meta data for an assistance information element.

elementList.name: GNSS ID
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (gps, sbas, qzss, galileo, glonass, bds, navic ...)

definitionList.name: Positioning SIB Type
descriptionList: This parameter defines a specific positioning SIB, as defined in TS 37.355 [14].

elementList.name: Positioning SIB Type
elementList.type: ENUMERATED ( posSibType1-1, posSibType1-2, posSibType1-3, posSibType1-4, posSibType1-5, posSibType1-6, posSibType1-7, posSibType1-8, posSibType2-1, posSibType2-2, posSibType2-3, posSibType2-4, posSibType2-5, posSibType2-6, posSibType2-7, posSibType2-8, posSibType2-9, posSibType2-10, posSibType2-11, posSibType2-12, posSibType2-13, posSibType2-14, posSibType2-15, posSibType2-16, posSibType2-17, posSibType2-18, posSibType2-19, posSibType2-20, posSibType2-21, posSibType2-22, posSibType2-23, posSibType2-24, posSibType2-25, posSibType3-1, posSibType4-1, posSibType5-1, posSibType6-1, posSibType6-2, posSibType6-3, ..., posSibType1-9, posSibType1-10, posSibType6-4, posSibType6-5, posSibType6-6)

definitionList.name: Assistance Information Failure List
descriptionList: This parameter identifies the assistance information for which the NG-RAN Node failed to configure broadcasting.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of assistance information failure list items that can be signaled with one message. Value is 32.

definitionList.name: TRP ID
descriptionList: The TRP ID IE is used to identify a TRP uniquely within an NG-RAN node.

elementList.name: TRP Identifier
elementList.description: Identifies a TRP within an NG-RAN node

definitionList.name: TRP Information
descriptionList: The TRP Information IE contains information for one TRP within an NG-RAN node.

elementList.name: NR PCI
elementList.description: NR Physical Cell ID

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of TRP information types that can be requested and reported with one message. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: Search Window Information
descriptionList: This information element contains search window information for the TRP.

elementList.name: Expected Propagation Delay
elementList.description: Indicates when the SRS is expected to arrive in time at the TRP relative to the UL RTOA Reference Time. The UL RTOA Reference Time for a target SRS is defined as , where - is the SFN Initialisation Time - , where and are the system frame number and the subframe number of the SRS, respectively. Granularity 4Ts, where Ts=1/(15103 2048) seconds. Centre of the search window.

elementList.name: Delay Uncertainty
elementList.description: Indicates the uncertainty of the expected SRS arrival time at the TRP Granularity 4Ts, where Ts=1/(151032048) seconds. Single-sided search window.

definitionList.name: Requested SRS Transmission Characteristics
descriptionList: This IE contains the requested SRS configuration for the UE.

elementList.name: Number Of Periodic Transmissions
elementList.description: The number of periodic SRS transmissions requested. The value of ‘0’ represents an infinite number of periodic SRS transmissions.

elementList.name: Number of SRS Resources Per Set
elementList.description: The number of SRS Resources per resource set for SRS transmission.

elementList.name: PeriodicitySRS
elementList.description: Milli-seconds

elementList.name: Spatial Relation Information
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Spatial Relation Information per SRS Resource IE is present.

elementList.name: Spatial Relation Information per SRS Resource
SRS Frequency
elementList.description: NR ARFCN The carrier frequency of SRS transmission bandwidth.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of requested SRS Resource Sets for SRS transmission. Value is 16.
Maximum no of SRS Resources per set. Value is 16.

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the Resource Type IE is set to the value "Periodic".

definitionList.name: SRS Configuration
descriptionList: This information element contains the SRS configuration configured by the NG-RAN node for the UE.

elementList.name: Point A
elementList.description: NR ARFCN

elementList.name: Uplink Channel BW-PerSCS-List
elementList.description: SCS-SpecificCarrier TS 38.331 [13]

elementList.name: Offset To Carrier
elementList.description: First usable RB to Point A in the number of PRBs

elementList.name: Active UL BWP
elementList.description: Only the configuration in the active UL BWP is needed.

elementList.name: SRS Config
elementList.description: SRS-Config as defined in TS 38.331 [13]

elementList.name: SRS Resource
elementList.description: SRS-Resource as defined in TS 38.331 [13]

elementList.name: Positioning SRS Resource
elementList.description: SRS-PosResource-r16 as defined in TS 38.331 [13]

elementList.name: SRS Resource Set
elementList.description: SRS-ResourceSet as defined in TS 38.331 [13]

elementList.name: Positioning SRS Resource Set
elementList.description: SRS-PosResourceSet-r16 as defined in TS 38.331 [13]

elementList.name: NR PCI
elementList.description: Physical Cell ID of the cell that contains the SRS carrier

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of carriers for SRS. Value is 32.
Maximum no of SCS spacings for a carrier. Value is 5.
Maximum no of SRS resources per UL BWP. Value is 64.
Maximum no of positioning SRS resources per UL BWP. Value is 64.
Maximum no of SRS resource sets per UL BWP. Value is 16.
Maximum no of positioning SRS resource sets per UL BWP. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: SRS Resource
descriptionList: This information element contains the SRS resource.

elementList.name: Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(slot1, slot2, slot4, slot5, slot8, slot10, slot16, slot20, slot32, slot40, slot64, slot80, slot160, slot320, slot640, slot1280, slot2560, …)

elementList.name: Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(slot1, slot2, slot4, slot5, slot8, slot10, slot16, slot20, slot32, slot40, slot64, slot80, slot160, slot320, slot640, slot1280, slot2560, …)

definitionList.name: Positioning SRS Resource
descriptionList: This information element contains the SRS resource for positioning.

elementList.name: Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(slot1, slot2, slot4, slot5, slot8, slot10, slot16, slot20, slot32, slot40, slot64, slot80, slot160, slot320, slot640, slot1280, slot2560, slot5120, slot10240, slot40960, slot81920,…)

elementList.name: Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(slot 1, slot 2, slot4, slot5, slot8, slot10, slot16, slot20, slot32, slot40, slot64, slot80, slot160, slot320, slot640, slot1280, slot2560, slot5120, slot10240, slot40960, slot81920,…)

definitionList.name: SRS Resource Set
descriptionList: This information element indicates an SRS resource set in the UE for UL SRS transmission.

elementList.name: Slot offset
elementList.description: Offset in number of slots, where value 0 indicates no offset.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of SRS resources per SRS resource set. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: Positioning SRS Resource Set
descriptionList: This information element indicates a positioning SRS resource set in the UE for UL SRS transmission.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of positioning SRS resources per positioning SRS resource set. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: SRS Resource Set ID
descriptionList: This information element indicates a resource set in the UE for UL SRS transmission.

elementList.name: SRS Resource Set ID
elementList.description: According to TS 38.331 [13]

definitionList.name: Spatial Relation Information
descriptionList: This information element indicates a spatial relation for transmission of UL SRS by a UE.

elementList.name: Spatial Relation for Resource ID
elementList.description: According to TS 38.321 [15] and TS 38.331 [13]

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of Spatial Relations that can be configured.  Value is 64.

definitionList.name: SRS Resource Trigger
descriptionList: This information element indicates a DCI code point according to a SRS resource set configuration.

elementList.name: Aperiodic SRS Resource Trigger List
elementList.description: According to TS 38.331 [13]

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of SRS trigger states. Value is 3.

definitionList.name: Relative Time 1900
descriptionList: This information element indicates the initialisation time (e.g. SFN Initalisation Time for a cell, requested time for an action, etc).

elementList.name: Relative Time 1900
elementList.description: Time in seconds relative to 00:00:00 on 1 January 1900 (calculated as continuous time without leap seconds and traceable to a common time reference) where binary encoding of the integer part is in the first 32 bits and binary encoding of the fraction part in the last 32 bits. The fraction part is expressed with a granularity of 1 /2**32 second

definitionList.name: TRP Measurement Result
descriptionList: This information element contains the measurement result.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of measured quantities that can be configured and reported with one positioning measurement message. Value is 16384.

definitionList.name: UL Angle of Arrival
descriptionList: This information element contains the uplink Angle of Arrival measurement.

elementList.name: LCS to GCS Translation
elementList.description: If absent, the azimuth and zenith are provided in GCS.

definitionList.name: UL RTOA Measurement
descriptionList: This information element contains the uplink RTOA measurement.

elementList.name: Additional Path List
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Extended Additional Path List IE is included

elementList.name: TRP Rx Timing Error Margin
elementList.description: Timing error margin associated to the TRP Rx TEG ID.

definitionList.name: gNB Rx-Tx Time Difference
descriptionList: This information element contains the gNB Rx-Tx Time Difference measurement.

elementList.name: CHOICE gNB Rx-Tx Time Difference Measurement
Additional Path List
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Extended Additional Path List IE is included

definitionList.name: Additional Path List
descriptionList: This information element contains the additional path results of time measurement.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of additional path measurement. Value is 2.

definitionList.name: Time Stamp
descriptionList: This information element contains the time stamp.

definitionList.name: Measurement Quality
descriptionList: This information element contains the TRP’s best estimate of the quality of the measurement.

definitionList.name: PRS Configuration
descriptionList: This information element contains the DL PRS configuration for the TRP.

elementList.name: Start PRB
elementList.description: Starting PRB to Point A

elementList.name: Point A
elementList.description: NR ARFCN

elementList.name: Muting Pattern
elementList.description: Muting pattern option 1 is used to mute the whole PRS resource set (within a period)

elementList.name: Muting Pattern
elementList.description: Muting pattern option 2 is used to mute the selected repetition of the resource set (within the period)

elementList.name: PRS Resource List
elementList.description: NR-DL-PRS-Resource-r16 as defined in TS 37.355 [14]

elementList.name: QCL Source PRS Resource Set ID
QCL Source PRS Resource ID
elementList.description: If it is absent, the QCL source PRS resource ID is the same as the PRS resource ID

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of PRS resources set. Value is 8.
Maximum no of PRS resources per PRS resource set. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: Spatial Direction Information
descriptionList: This information element contains the spatial direction information of the DL PRS resources for the TRP.

elementList.name: NR-PRS Beam Information
elementList.description: The spatial directions of DL-PRS Resources for TRP

definitionList.name: Geographical Coordinates
descriptionList: This information element contains the geographical coordinates for the TRP and any associated ARP(s).

elementList.name: TRP Position
elementList.description: The configured estimated geographical position of the antenna of the cell/TRP.

elementList.name: TRP High Accuracy Access Position
elementList.reference: NG-RAN High Accuracy Access Point Position 9.2.49
elementList.description: The configured estimated geographical high accuracy position of the antenna of the cell/TRP.

elementList.name: Reference Point
elementList.description: The reference point is used to derive the TRP position

elementList.name: TRP Position Relative Geodetic
elementList.description: The configured estimated relative geodetic coordinate of the antenna of the cell/TRP

elementList.name: TRP Position Relative Cartesian
elementList.description: The configured estimated relative Cartesian coordinate of the antenna of the cell/TRP

elementList.name: DL-PRS Resource Coordinates
elementList.description: DL-PRS Resource Coordinates relative to the TRP coordinate

definitionList.name: DL-PRS Resource Coordinates
descriptionList: This information element contains the geographical coordinates of the antenna reference points (ARP) for the DL-PRS Resources of a TRP.

elementList.name: CHOICE DL-PRS Resource Set ARP Location
elementList.description: Relative to the geographical coordinates for the TRP. If this IE is absent, the Relative Location is zero for the indicated DL-PRS Resource Set ID.

elementList.name: CHOICE DL-PRS Resource ARP Location
elementList.description: Relative to the DL-PRS Resource Set ARP Location. If this IE is absent, the Relative Location is zero for the indicated DL-PRS Resource ID.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of DL-PRS resource sets per TRP. Value is 2.
Maximum no of DL-PRS resources of the DL-PRS resource set of the TRP. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: Relative Geodetic Location
descriptionList: This information element provides a location relative to some known reference location in a relative geodetic coordinate system.

elementList.name: Milli-Arc-Second Units
elementList.description: Units and scale factor for the delta-latitude and delta-longitude fields. 0.03, 0.3, 3, milliarcseconds. TS 37.355 [14].

elementList.name: Height Units
elementList.description: Units and scale factor for the delta-height field. 10-3 metre, 10-2 metre, TS 37.355 [14].

elementList.name: Delta Latitude
elementList.description: Delta value in latitude in the unit provided in Milli-Arc-Second Units. TS 37.355 [14].

elementList.name: Delta Longitude
elementList.description: Delta value in longitude in the unit provided in Milli-Arc-Second Units. TS 37.355 [14].

elementList.name: Delta Height
elementList.description: Delta value in ellipsoidal height in the unit provided in Height Units. TS 37.355 [14].

definitionList.name: NG-RAN High Accuracy Access Point Position
descriptionList: The NG-RAN High Accuracy Access Point Position IE is used to identify the geographical position of an NG-RAN Access Point. It is expressed as High Accuracy Ellipsoid point with altitude and uncertainty ellipsoid according to TS 23.032 [8].

definitionList.name: Relative Cartesian Location
descriptionList: This information element provides a location relative to some known reference location in a relative Cartesian coordinate system.

elementList.name: X value
elementList.description: Positive value represents easting from reference point, in units of XYZ Unit IE.

elementList.name: Y value
elementList.description: Positive value represents northing from reference point in units of XYZ Unit IE.

elementList.name: Z value
elementList.description: Height with respect to reference point in units of XYZ Unit IE, where the XY-plane is horizontal and the Z-axis points up.

definitionList.name: Reference Point
descriptionList: This information element provides a reference point information.

elementList.name: CHOICE ReferencePoint
elementList.description: Reference point to which relative location information is related to

elementList.name: Coordinate ID
elementList.description: Referential ID mapped via OAM

elementList.name: Reference Point High Accuracy Access Position
elementList.reference: NG-RAN High Accuracy Access Point Position 9.2.49

definitionList.name: Location Uncertainty
descriptionList: This information element provides the location uncertainty information.

elementList.name: Horizontal Uncertainty
elementList.description: Horizontal uncertainty of the ARP latitude/longitude. Corresponds to the encoded high accuracy uncertainty as defined in TS 23.032 [8]

elementList.name: Horizontal Confidence
elementList.description: Corresponds to confidence as defined in TS 23.032 [8].

elementList.name: Vertical Uncertainty
elementList.description: Vertical uncertainty of the ARP altitude. Corresponds to the encoded high accuracy uncertainty as defined in TS 23.032 [8]

elementList.name: Vertical Confidence
elementList.description: Corresponds to confidence as defined in TS 23.032 [8].

definitionList.name: Pathloss Reference Information
descriptionList: This information element indicates a pathloss reference for transmission of UL SRS by a UE.

definitionList.name: SSB Information
descriptionList: This information element contains the SSB time/frequency information for the TRPs.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of SSBs for which the configuration can be provided. Value is 255.

definitionList.name: SSB Time/Frequency Configuration
descriptionList: This information element contains the time and frequency configuration of an SSB.

elementList.name: SSB frequency
elementList.description: ARFCN

elementList.name: SSB Transmit power
elementList.description: EPRE of SSS

definitionList.name: DL-PRS Muting Pattern
descriptionList: This information element contains the DL-PRS muting pattern.

definitionList.name: Measurement Beam Information
descriptionList: This information element contains the receiving beam information when measuring UL signals.

definitionList.name: NR-PRS Beam Information
descriptionList: This IE contains spatial direction information of the DL-PRS Resources.

elementList.name: PRS Resource Set ID
elementList.description: The resource set in which the resources are associated with the angle.

elementList.name: NR PRS Azimuth fine
elementList.description: Fine angles

elementList.name: NR PRS Elevation fine
elementList.description: Fine angles

elementList.name: LCS to GCS Translation List
elementList.description: If absent, the azimuth and elevation are provided in GCS.

elementList.name: Alpha-fine
elementList.description: Fine angles

elementList.name: Beta-fine
elementList.description: Fine angles

elementList.name: Gamma-fine
elementList.description: Fine angles

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of DL-PRS resource sets per TRP. Value is 2.
Maximum no of DL-PRS resources of the DL-PRS resource set of the TRP. Value is 64.
Maximum no. of LCS-GS-Translation-Parameters that can reported with one message. Value is 3.  The current version of the specification supports 1.

definitionList.name: Positioning Broadcast Cells
descriptionList: This IE is used to indicate the cells that are requested to broadcast, or failed to broadcast, the associated posSIB(s).

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of cells broadcasting a posSIB in a NG-RAN node. Value is 16384.

definitionList.name: Spatial Relation Information per SRS Resource
descriptionList: This information element indicates a spatial relation for transmission of each UL SRS resource recommended by LMF.

elementList.name: Spatial Relation per SRS Resource List
Spatial Relation per SRS Resource Item

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of SRS resources per SRS resource set. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: Requested DL PRS Transmission Characteristics
descriptionList: This IE contains the requested PRS configuration for transmission by the LMF.

elementList.name: Resource Set Start Time and Duration
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Start Time and Duration IE is present

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of PRS resources set. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: Requested DL-PRS Resource List
descriptionList: This IE contains the requested DL-PRS resource list.

elementList.name: Requested DL-PRS Resource List
elementList.description: NR-DL-PRS-Resource-r16 as defined in TS 37.355 [14]

elementList.name: QCL Source PRS Resource Set ID

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of PRS resources per PRS resource set. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: Start Time and Duration
descriptionList: This IE contains the start time and/or duration for the on-demand DL-PRS.

elementList.name: Duration
elementList.description: Unit: seconds

definitionList.name: PRS Transmission Off Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the information to turn off particular PRS transmissions.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of PRS resources set. Value is 8.
Maximum no of PRS resources per PRS resource set. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: On-demand PRS TRP Information
descriptionList: This IE contains on-demand PRS information for the TRP.

elementList.name: On-demand PRS Request Allowed
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents an on-demand PRS transmission parameter: first bit: Resource Set Periodicity second bit: PRS Bandwidth third bit: Resource Repetition Factor fourth bit: Resource Number of Symbols fifth bit: Comb Size sixth bit: Number of Frequency Layers seventh bit: Start Time and Duration eighth bit: Off Indication ninth bit: QCL Information Other bits reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’.

elementList.name: Allowed Resource Set Periodicity Values
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the first bit of the On-demand PRS Request Allowed IE is set to ‘1’. Each position in the bitmap represents a value of the Resource Set Periodicity IE defined in subclause 9.2.61, first bit = 4 and so on. Bits 21-24 are reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’. If this IE is absent, all Resource Set Periodicity values are allowed to be requested.

elementList.name: Allowed PRS Bandwidth Values
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the second bit of the On-demand PRS Request Allowed IE is set to ‘1’. Each position in the bitmap represents a value of the PRS Bandwidth IE defined in subclause 9.2.61, first bit = 1 and so on. Bit 64 is reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’. If this IE is absent, all PRS Bandwidth values are allowed to be requested.

elementList.name: Allowed Resource Repetition Factor Values
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the third bit of the On-demand PRS Request Allowed IE is set to ‘1’. Each position in the bitmap represents a value of the Resource Repetition Factor IE defined in subclause 9.2.61, first bit = rf1 and so on. Bit 8 is reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’. If this IE is absent, all Resource Repetition Factor values are allowed to be requested.

elementList.name: Allowed Resource Number of Symbols Values
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the fourth bit of the On-demand PRS Request Allowed IE is set to ‘1’. Each position in the bitmap represents a value of the Resource Number of Symbols IE defined in subclause 9.2.61, first bit = n2 and so on. Bits 5-8 are reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’. If this IE is absent, all Resource Number of Symbols values are allowed to be requested.

elementList.name: Allowed Comb Size Values
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the fifth bit of the On-demand PRS Request Allowed IE is set to ‘1’. Each position in the bitmap represents a value of the Comb Size IE defined in subclause 9.2.61, first bit = 2 and so on. Bits 5-8 are reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’. If this IE is absent, all Comb Size values are allowed to be requested.

definitionList.name: UL-AoA assistance information
descriptionList: This information element contains the expected uplink Angle of Arrival and uncertainty range.

elementList.name: Expected Azimuth AoA
elementList.description: Defined as (φAOA - ΔφAOA/2, φAOA + ΔφAOA/2)

elementList.name: Expected Azimuth AoA Value
elementList.description: φAOA component of Expected Azimuth AoA

elementList.name: Expected Azimuth AoA Uncertainty Range
elementList.description: ΔφAOA component of Expected Azimuth AoA

elementList.name: Expected Zenith AoA
elementList.description: Defined as (θZOA – ΔθZOA/2, θZOA + ΔθZOA/2)

elementList.name: Expected Zenith AoA Value
elementList.description: θZOA component of Expected Zenith AoA

elementList.name: Expected Zenith AoA Uncertainty Range
elementList.description: ΔθZOA component of Expected Zenith AoA

elementList.name: Expected UL Angle of Arrival Zenith Only
elementList.description: Defined as (θZOA – ΔθZOA/2, θZOA + ΔθZOA/2)

elementList.name: Expected Zenith AoA Value
elementList.description: θZOA component of Expected Zenith AoA

elementList.name: Expected Zenith AoA Uncertainty Range
elementList.description: ΔθZOA component of Expected Zenith AoA

elementList.name: LCS to GCS Translation
elementList.description: If absent, the azimuth and zenith are provided in GCS. In case of zenith only, the z-axis of LCS is defined along the linear array axis.

definitionList.name: Z-AoA
descriptionList: This information element contains the Zenith Angle of Arrival information, which can correspond to linear array measurement.

elementList.name: LCS to GCS Translation
elementList.description: If absent, the zenith is provided in GCS. the z-axis of LCS is defined along the linear array axis

definitionList.name: Response Time
descriptionList: This information element contains the response time of the measurement results reporting.

definitionList.name: LCS to GCS Translation
descriptionList: This information element contains the LCS to GCS Translation information.

definitionList.name: UE Reporting Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the UE Reporting Information.

elementList.name: Reporting Amount
elementList.description: Value 0 represents an infinite number of periodic reporting

elementList.name: Reporting Interval
elementList.description: Unit: seconds

definitionList.name: Multiple UL-AoA
descriptionList: This information element contains the list of the multiple UL-AOAs values.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of UL-AOAs values (pair of AOA & ZOA values) that can be reported. Value is 8

definitionList.name: UL SRS-RSRPP
descriptionList: This information element contains the UL SRS RSRPP measurement.

definitionList.name: SRS Resource type
descriptionList: This IE contains the SRS resource type.

elementList.name: SRS Port Index
elementList.description: This IE may be present if the SRS Resource ID IE is present, and is ignored otherwise.

definitionList.name: Extended Additional Path List
descriptionList: This IE contains the extended additional path results of time measurement.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of additional path measurement. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: ARP ID
descriptionList: This IE is used to uniquely identify an ARP associated with a TRP.

definitionList.name: ARP Location Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the relative position of ARP(s) to the TRP.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of ARPs associated with a TRP. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: LoS/NLoS Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the LoS/NLoS information for UL measurement.

elementList.name: LoS/NLoS Indicator Soft
elementList.description: Values provide the likelihood of a LOS propagation path in the range between 0 and 1 with 0.1 steps resolution. Value '0' indicates NLOS and value '1' indicates LOS.

definitionList.name: UE Tx TEG Association List
descriptionList: This information element contains the list of UE Tx TEG associations.

elementList.name: Carrier Frequency
elementList.description: Indicates the frequency of the positioning SRS resources

elementList.name: Point A
elementList.description: NR ARFCN

elementList.name: UE Tx Timing Error Margin
elementList.description: Timing error margin associated to the UE Tx TEG ID.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of reported UE Tx TEG associations. Value is 256.
Maximum no of positioning SRS resources. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: TRP Tx TEG Association
descriptionList: This information element contains the TRP Tx TEG information.

elementList.name: TRP Tx Timing Error Margin
elementList.description: Timing error margin associated to the TRP Tx TEG ID.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of reported TRP Tx TEG association. Value is 8.
Maximum no of DL-PRS resources of the DL-PRS resource set of the TRP. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: TRP TEG ID Information
descriptionList: This information element contains the TRP RxTx TEG ID group information.

elementList.name: TRP RxTx Timing Error Margin
elementList.description: Timing error margin associated to the TRP RxTx TEG ID.

elementList.name: TRP Tx Timing Error Margin
elementList.description: Timing error margin associated to the TRP Tx TEG ID.

elementList.name: TRP Rx Timing Error Margin
elementList.description: Timing error margin associated to the TRP Rx TEG ID.

elementList.name: TRP Tx Timing Error Margin
elementList.description: Timing error margin associated to the TRP Tx TEG ID.

definitionList.name: Measurement Characteristics Request Indicator
descriptionList: This IE contains the measurement characteristic information requested by LMF.

elementList.name: Measurement characteristic request indicator
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents a requested measurement characteristic: first bit: Measurement Beam Information Second bit: Extended Additional Path List Third bit: Additional Path Power Fourth Bit: Multiple UL AoA of Additional Path Fifth bit: LoS/NLoS Information Sixth bit: TRP Rx TEG association for UL-TDOA Seventh bit: TRP RxTxTEG-ID information for DL+UL positioning. Eighth bit: SRS Resource Type Ninth bit: Multiple Measurement Instances Other bits reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘requested measurement characteristic’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘not requested’.

definitionList.name: TRP Beam Antenna Information
descriptionList: The IE provides the beam antenna information of the TRP. It includes either the explicit beam antenna information, or a reference to another TRP’s signalled configuration, or the indication that no change has occurred with respect to previously signalled configuration.

elementList.name: CHOICE TRP Beam Antenna Info Item
Associated TRP ID
elementList.description: This IE specifies the TRP ID of the associated TRP from which the beam information parameters are adopted in Local Coordinate System (LCS).

elementList.name: LCS to GCS Translation
elementList.description: Included if the azimuth and elevation are not provided in GCS.

elementList.name: No Change
elementList.description: No change compared to the previously signalled configuration for this TRP.

definitionList.name: TRP Beam Antenna Angles
descriptionList: The IE provides the beam antenna information of the TRP.

elementList.name: TRP Azimuth Angle
elementList.description: For GCS, the azimuth angle is measured counter-clockwise from geographical North. For LCS, the azimuth angle is measured counter-clockwise from the x-axis of the LCS.

elementList.name: TRP Azimuth Angle fine
elementList.description: Fine angle

elementList.name: TRP Elevation Angle
elementList.description: For GCS, the elevation angle is measured relative to zenith and positive to the horizontal direction (elevation 0 deg. points to zenith, 90 deg to the horizon). For LCS, the elevation angle is measured relative to the z-axis of the LCS (elevation 0 deg. points to the z-axis, 90 deg to the x-y plane).

elementList.name: TRP Elevation Angle fine
elementList.description: Fine angle

elementList.name: TRP Beam Power List
elementList.description: Relative power between DL-PRS Resources for the given Azimuth and Elevation Angle. The first Relative Power element in this list provides the peak power for this Azimuth/Elevation angle and is defined as 0dB power. All the remaining Relative Power Element's in this list provide the relative DL-PRS Resource power relative to this first element in the list.

elementList.name: PRS Resource Set ID
elementList.description: DL-PRS Resource Set ID of the DL-PRS Resource for which the Relative Power is provided. If this field is absent, the DL-PRS Resource Set ID for this instance of the Beam Power List is the same as the DL-PRS Resource Set ID of the previous instance in the Beam Power List. This field shall be included at least in the first instance of the Beam Power List.

elementList.name: PRS Resource ID
elementList.description: DL-PRS Resource for which the Relative Power is provided.

elementList.name: TRP Beam Relative Power
elementList.description: The power values span from -30 to 0dB

elementList.name: TRP Beam Relative Power "fine"
elementList.description: Relative Power with 0.1dB resolution. The power spans from -0.9 to 0dB

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum number of DL-PRS Resources per angle per TRP. Value is 24.
Maximum number of azimuth angles per TRP. Value is 3600.
Maximum number of elevation angles per azimuth angle/TRP. Value is 1801.

definitionList.name: Timing Error Margin
descriptionList: This information element contains the Timing error margin for the UE or TRP TEG.

elementList.name: Timing Error Margin
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(Tc0, Tc2, Tc4, Tc6, Tc8, Tc12, Tc16, Tc20, Tc24, Tc32, Tc40, Tc48, Tc56, Tc64, Tc72, Tc80,…)
